p: Thirty male Swiss albino mice, ten-weeks-old, weighing about 25 ± 2 g, were purchased from the Egyptian Organization for Biological Products and Vaccines, Giza, Egypt. The animals were reared at Experimental Animal Unit at Faculty of Veterinary Medicine, Suez Canal University, Ismailia, Egypt. They were kept on a 12-h light/dark cycle in a maintained temperature (24 ± 2 °C) and humidity (50 ± 5%) conditions. All procedures in this animal study were performed according the guidelines of NIH and approved by Animal Research Ethics committee of Faculty of Veterinary Medicine, Suez Canal University, Ismailia, Egypt (Approval Number:201613).
